text: @realDonaldTrump Okay, Mr Trump, why don’t you put your money where your mouth is: take Air Force One to Georgia, get a tattoo (Keep AMERICA  COVID-19 FREE), go bowling, swim in the ocean, have a massage and return home to infect family & friends. STEP DOWN & SHUT UP!
